boardgame.name: Saint Pétersbourg (deuxième édition)
Saint Petersburg (second edition)
Sankt Petersburg (zweite edition)
Sint Petersburg (2e editie)
サンクトぺテルブルク 第2版
聖彼得堡
boardgame.description: In Saint Petersburg, you'll be buying different types of cards: workers, buildings, aristocrats, exchange cards, and the new market cards. In every phase, a new type of card will be available for purchase. You'll start with workers, who are good at bringing in rubles. The new market (yellow) cards bring in new resources. Having the majorities in these resources from round to round will earn you additional victory points. This battle for the lead enhances the game experience and expands the tactical and strategic possibilities of the players. In the next phase, buildings can be acquired, mostly granting victory points. Aristocrats provide a mix of victory points and rubles, and also lead to a large end-game point bonus that can't be ignored. Exchange cards allow already purchased cards to be improved._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;These phases will repeat until one of the card decks runs out. At this point, the final victory points are counted, and the winner is declared._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;For this new edition of Saint Petersburg, we've kept the well-known and loved basic game, but also added an additional game phase. This will allow us to fully integrate the fifth player into the game. The new market phase will introduce a new mechanic providing additional victory points and rubles. The purple action cards from the banquet expansion will also have matching cards for the market phase. And, of course, for lovers of the old version, it will still be possible to play the game by the original rules._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: Sankt Petersburg - The Banquet Expansion (Second English Edition, 24 cards as shown on the photo) + game rules, 0.1 Kg There are 24 cards for sale only. You need the basis game of Sankt Petersburg (Second Edition). The cards are inside a transparent plastic bag (Zipptüte). Condition/Zustand: new, unused and sealed / neu, unbenutzt und in Folie verpackt General Information: I sell this item as a private seller. I can not give any guarantees or refunds. Nevertheless as a board game collector I describe the item as accurate as possible. In case of missing tiles or damages I mention this in the item description. Diesen Artikel verkaufe ich als Privatperson. Eine Garantie oder eine Ruecknahme biete ich nicht an. Als Sammler von Brettspielen achte ich jedoch sehr genau auf den Zustand und auf die Vollzaehligkeit. Die Spiele sind daher meistens tadellos erhalten. Sollten Maengel vorhanden sein, werden diese auch in der Beschreibung unter _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Condition/Zustand_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; erwaehnt. Ich versende Spiele in folgende Laender: / I ship board games and board game expansions to the following countries: In case you live in a different country please contact me before you buy an item.
